action_details: Given the high-severity electrical fire incident at Av. Campo del Sur, 262, 11002 Cadiz, Spain, with three injured individuals—one unconscious and two with burns and heavy coughing—immediately dispatch a medical team consisting of three doctors: one trauma specialist to stabilize the unconscious patient, one burn specialist to treat the patients with burns, and one general practitioner to provide supportive care for all three patients. Ensure that the medical staff is equipped with necessary emergency supplies, such as oxygen tanks, bandages, and burn creams. Upon arrival, quickly assess each patient's condition, administer basic life support measures (CPR if needed), and transport them to a nearby hospital or a designated medical facility. Communicate closely with the dispatch team for further instructions and updates.
